33  class DistrValue {
34  public:
36  DistrValue(double from, double to, double value)
37  : impl_( (std::min)(from, to), (std::max)(from, to), value)
38  {}
39 
41  DistrValue(const DistrValue& v) : impl_(v.impl_) {}
43  DistrValue& operator=(const DistrValue& v) {
44  impl_ = v.impl_;
45  return *this;
46  }
48  ~DistrValue() {}
50  double getFrom() const { return boost::get<0>(impl_); }
52  double getTo() const { return boost::get<1>(impl_); }
54  double getValue() const { return boost::get<2>(impl_); }
56  void setValue(double val) { boost::get<2>(impl_) = val; }
57 
58  //comparison
59  bool operator==(const DistrValue& v) const { return impl_ == v.impl_; }
60 
61  //comparison - to sort ranges
62  bool operator<(const DistrValue& v) const {
63  if(getFrom() == v.getFrom() )
64  return getTo() < v.getTo();
65  return getFrom() < v.getFrom();
66  }
67 
68  private:
69  boost::tuple<double, double, double> impl_;
70  };
71 
72  //stream operator (to debug)
73  inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const DistrValue& v) {
74  os << "[" << v.getFrom() << ", " << v.getTo() << "]:" << v.getValue();
75  return os;
76  }
77 
79  typedef std::vector<DistrValue> DistrValues;
80 
81  namespace {
82 
83  //the lenght of histogram value
84  double getLength(const DistrValue& v) { return v.getTo() - v.getFrom(); }
85  //the maximum value (because histogram value is a part of probability density)
86  double getMaximumValue(const DistrValue& v) { return 1./getLength(v); }
87  //the area of range
88  double getArea(const DistrValue& v) { return getLength(v)*v.getValue(); }
89  //the arithmetic mean of range
90  double getMeanTerm(const DistrValue& v) {
91  return 0.5*(v.getFrom() + v.getTo())*getArea(v);
92  }
93  //the term to calcualte variation
94  double getVariationTerm(const DistrValue& v, const double mi) {
95  double a = v.getFrom() - mi;
96  double b = v.getTo() - mi;
97  return v.getValue()* ( pow(b, 3.0) - pow(a, 3.0) )/ 3.0;
98  }
99  }
100 
104  inline DistrValues makeProbabilityDensity(const DistrValues& in) {
105  typedef std::list<DistrValue> Val;
106  Val val(in.begin(), in.end() );
107  val.sort();
108 
109  //remove gaps and overllaped ranges
110  Val::iterator curr = val.begin();
111  Val::iterator next = curr;
112  if( next != val.end() )
113  ++next;
114  while( next != val.end() ) {
115  if(next->getFrom() < curr->getTo() ) { //overlapped ranges
116  if( next->getTo() <= curr->getTo() ) {
117  //remove the next period
118  Val::iterator it = next;
119  ++next;
120  val.erase(it);
121  continue;
122  }
123  else {
124  //change the from parameter for the next period
125  *next = DistrValue( curr->getTo(), next->getTo(), next->getValue() );
126  }
127  }
128  else if(next->getFrom() > curr->getTo() ) { //gap
129  val.insert(next, DistrValue( curr->getTo(), next->getFrom(), 0.0 ) );
130  }
131  //accept
132  curr = next;
133  ++next;
134  }
135  double sum = std::accumulate( val.begin(), val.end(), 0.0,
136  boost::bind( std::plus<double>(), _1,
137  boost::bind(&getArea, _2) ) );
138 
139  if(sum == 0.0) sum = 1.0;
140 
141  //modify values
142  for(Val::iterator i = val.begin(); i != val.end(); ++i ) {
143  i->setValue( i->getValue() / sum );
144  }
145  return DistrValues( val.begin(), val.end() );
146  }
147 
148  //stream operator (to debug)
149  inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const DistrValues& v) {
150  std::copy(v.begin(), v.end(), std::ostream_iterator<DistrValue>(os,"; ") );
151  return os;
152  }

155  class RandomCustomDistr {
156  public:
157  RandomCustomDistr() : gen_() {
158  values_.push_back( DistrValue(0.0, 1.0, 1.0) );
159  }
160  RandomCustomDistr( const DistrValues& values )
161  : values_( makeProbabilityDensity(values) ), gen_()
162  { }
163 
165  RandomCustomDistr& operator=(const RandomCustomDistr& h) {
166  values_ = h.values_;
167  return *this;
168  }
169 
170  RandomCustomDistr(const RandomCustomDistr& h) : values_(h.values_), gen_(h.gen_) {}
171  virtual ~RandomCustomDistr() {}
172 
174  const DistrValues& getValues() const { return values_; }
175 
177  double operator()() {
178  return getQuantile( gen_() );
179  }
180 
182  double getMean() const {
183  return std::accumulate( values_.begin(), values_.end(), 0.0,
184  boost::bind( std::plus<double>(), _1,
185  boost::bind(&getMeanTerm, _2) ) );
186  }
187 
189  double getStandardDeviation() const {
190  double mi = getMean();
191  double variation = std::accumulate( values_.begin(), values_.end(), 0.0,
192  boost::bind( std::plus<double>(), _1,
193  boost::bind(&getVariationTerm, _2, mi) ) );
194  return std::sqrt(variation);
195  }
196 
198  double getQuantile(double k) const {
199  if( values_.empty() )
200  return std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();
201 
202  double sum = 0.0;
203  for(DistrValues::const_iterator it = values_.begin(); it != values_.end(); ++it ) {
204  double area = getArea(*it);
205  if( k >= sum && k < sum + area) {
206  //the area > 0 (because if area == 0 the condition is false (k >= sum && k < sum )
207  return getLength(*it) * ( k - sum ) / area + it->getFrom();
208  }
209  sum += area;
210  }
211  //return the last value
212  return values_.back().getTo();
213  }
215  double getProbabilityDensity(double x) const;
216 
218  double getDistribution(double x) const;
219  private:
220  DistrValues values_; //probablity distribution given by sum ranges
221  RandomDouble gen_; //generates uniform distribution <0,1)
222  };

227  // \brief performs the simulation, create the random custom distribution based on given values
228  class RandomCustomCreator {
229  public:
239  static double calculateEpsilon(double sigma, long num_steps) {
240  const double SIG = sigma;
241  const double N = num_steps >= 0 ? static_cast<double>(num_steps) : 1.0;
242  boost::math::normal normal01(0.0,1.0);
243  const double EPSILON = 0.5 * SIG / (boost::math::pdf(normal01, 3.0) * sqrt(N) );
244  return EPSILON;
245  }
246 
248  RandomCustomCreator(double e) : epsilon_(e), numValues_(0L) { }
249 
251  RandomCustomCreator(const RandomCustomCreator& c)
252  : epsilon_(c.epsilon_), histogram_(c.histogram_), numValues_(c.numValues_)
253  {}
254 
256  virtual ~RandomCustomCreator() {}
257 
258  //add the value to histogram, increments the proper interval
259  double addValue(double value) {
260  ++numValues_;
261 
262  //the mean of interval for given value
263  double key = floor(value/epsilon_)*epsilon_;
264 
265  Histogram::iterator it = histogram_.find(key);
266  if(it != histogram_.end() )
267  ++(it->second);
268  else
269  histogram_.insert( std::make_pair( key, 1L ) );
270 
271  return value;
272  }
273 
275  long getNumValues() const { return numValues_; }
276 
278  RandomCustomDistr getRandomCustomDistr() const {
279  const double epsilon2 = epsilon_/2.0;
280  DistrValues values;
281  for(Histogram::const_iterator it = histogram_.begin(); it != histogram_.end(); ++it) {
282  values.push_back( DistrValue( it->first - epsilon2,
283  it->first + epsilon2,
284  static_cast<double>(it->second) ) );
285  }
286  return RandomCustomDistr(values);
287  }
288  private:
289  //forbidden the assign operator
290  RandomCustomCreator& operator=(const RandomCustomCreator&);
291 
292  double epsilon_;
293 
294  typedef std::map<double,long> Histogram;
295  Histogram histogram_; //the interval of variable and the num of simulations in given interval
296  long numValues_; //the number of values
297  };
298 
299  namespace {
300  //the comparison functor
301  bool rangeLessThanValue(const DistrValue& range, const DistrValue& x ) {
302  return range.getTo() <= x.getTo();
303  }
304  }
305 
307  inline double RandomCustomDistr::getProbabilityDensity(double x) const {
308  //TODO: msvc not implements lower_bound with diff types, so temporary object
309  DistrValue v(x, x, 0.0);
310  DistrValues::const_iterator it =
311  std::lower_bound( values_.begin(), values_.end(), v, rangeLessThanValue );
312  if( it == values_.end() )
313  return 0.0; //above histogram or empty
314  if( it == values_.begin() && x < it->getFrom() )
315  return 0.0; //below histogram
316  return it->getValue();
317  }
318 
320  inline double RandomCustomDistr::getDistribution(double x) const {
321  //TODO: msvc not implements lower_bound with diff types, so temporary object
322  DistrValue v(x, x, 0.0);
323  DistrValues::const_iterator it =
324  std::lower_bound( values_.begin(), values_.end(), v, rangeLessThanValue );
325  //sum the values before x
326  double sum = std::accumulate( values_.begin(), it, 0.0, boost::bind( std::plus<double>(), _1, boost::bind(&getArea, _2) ) );
327  if( it != values_.end() )
328  if(it->getFrom() <= x && x <= it->getTo() )
329  sum += ( x - it->getFrom() ) * it->getValue();
330  return sum;
331  }
